member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About
member.summary: An item with user information and settings.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.AdditionalRoleInfo
member.summary: Information about supported additional roles per file type. The most specific type takes precedence.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.DomainSharingPolicy
member.summary: The domain sharing policy for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the item.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.ExportFormats
member.summary: The allowable export formats.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.Features
member.summary: List of additional features enabled on this account.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.ImportFormats
member.summary: The allowable import formats.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.IsCurrentAppInstalled
member.summary: A boolean indicating whether the authenticated app is installed by the authenticated user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#about.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.LargestChangeId
member.summary: The largest change id.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.MaxUploadSizes
member.summary: List of max upload sizes for each file type. The most specific type takes precedence.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.Name
member.summary: The name of the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.PermissionId
member.summary: The current user's ID as visible in the permissions collection.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.QuotaBytesTotal
member.summary: The total number of quota bytes.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.QuotaBytesUsed
member.summary: The number of quota bytes used.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.QuotaBytesUsedInTrash
member.summary: The number of quota bytes used by trashed items.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.RemainingChangeIds
member.summary: The number of remaining change ids.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.RootFolderId
member.summary: The id of the root folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this item.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.AdditionalRoleInfoData.RoleSets
member.summary: The supported additional roles per primary role.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.AdditionalRoleInfoData.Type
member.summary: The content type that this additional role info applies to.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.AdditionalRoleInfoData.RoleSetsData.AdditionalRoles
member.summary: The supported additional roles with the primary role.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.AdditionalRoleInfoData.RoleSetsData.PrimaryRole
member.summary: A primary permission role.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.ExportFormatsData.Source
member.summary: The content type to convert from.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.ExportFormatsData.Targets
member.summary: The possible content types to convert to.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.FeaturesData.FeatureName
member.summary: The name of the feature.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.FeaturesData.FeatureRate
member.summary: The request limit rate for this feature, in queries per second.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.ImportFormatsData.Source
member.summary: The imported file's content type to convert from.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.ImportFormatsData.Targets
member.summary: The possible content types to convert to.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.MaxUploadSizesData.Size
member.summary: The max upload size for this type.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.About.MaxUploadSizesData.Type
member.summary: The file type.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App
member.summary: Information about a third-party application which the user has installed or given access to Google Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.Authorized
member.summary: Whether the app is authorized to access data on the user's Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.Icons
member.summary: The various icons for the app.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.Id
member.summary: The ID of the app.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.Installed
member.summary: Whether the app is installed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#app.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.Name
member.summary: The name of the app.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.ObjectType
member.summary: The type of object this app creates (e.g. Chart). If empty, the app name should be used instead.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.PrimaryFileExtensions
member.summary: The list of primary file extensions.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.PrimaryMimeTypes
member.summary: The list of primary mime types.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.ProductUrl
member.summary: The product URL.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.SecondaryFileExtensions
member.summary: The list of secondary file extensions.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.SecondaryMimeTypes
member.summary: The list of secondary mime types.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.SupportsCreate
member.summary: Whether this app supports creating new objects.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.SupportsImport
member.summary: Whether this app supports importing Google Docs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.UseByDefault
member.summary: Whether the app is selected as the default handler for the types it supports.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.IconsData.Category
member.summary: Category of the icon. Allowed values are: - application - icon for the application - document - icon for a file associated with the app - documentShared - icon for a shared file associated with the app

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.IconsData.IconUrl
member.summary: URL for the icon.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.App.IconsData.Size
member.summary: Size of the icon. Represented as the maximum of the width and height.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.AppList
member.summary: A list of third-party applications which the user has installed or given access to Google Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.AppList.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.AppList.Items
member.summary: The actual list of apps.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.AppList.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#appList.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.AppList.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this list.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Change
member.summary: Representation of a change to a file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Change.Deleted
member.summary: Whether the file has been deleted.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Change.File
member.summary: The metadata for a file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Change.FileId
member.summary: The ID of the file associated with this change.

member.summary: The ID of the change.

member.summary: This is always drive#change.

member.summary: A link back to this change.

member.summary: A list of changes for a user.

member.summary: The ETag of the list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChangeList.Items
member.summary: The actual list of changes.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChangeList.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#changeList.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChangeList.LargestChangeId
member.summary: The current largest change ID.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChangeList.NextLink
member.summary: A link to the next page of changes.

member.summary: The page token for the next page of changes.

member.summary: A link back to this list.

member.summary: The ETag of the list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChildList.Items
member.summary: The actual list of children.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChildList.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#childList.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChildList.NextLink
member.summary: A link to the next page of children.

member.summary: The page token for the next page of children.

member.summary: A link back to this list.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChildReference

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChildReference.ChildLink
member.summary: A link to the child.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChildReference.Id
member.summary: The ID of the child.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChildReference.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#childReference.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ChildReference.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this reference.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File
member.summary: The metadata for a file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.AlternateLink
member.summary: A link for opening the file in using a relevant Google editor or viewer.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.CreatedDate
member.summary: Create time for this file (formatted ISO8601 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Description
member.summary: A short description of the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.DownloadUrl
member.summary: Short term download URL for the file. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Editable
member.summary: Whether the file can be edited by the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.EmbedLink
member.summary: A link for embedding the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ETag
member.summary: ETag of the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ExplicitlyTrashed
member.summary: Whether this file has been explicitly trashed, as opposed to recursively trashed. This will only be populated if the file is trashed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ExportLinks
member.summary: Links for exporting Google Docs to specific formats.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.FileExtension
member.summary: The file extension used when downloading this file. This field is set from the title when inserting or uploading new content. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.FileSize
member.summary: The size of the file in bytes. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Id
member.summary: The id of the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadata
member.summary: Metadata about image media. This will only be present for image types, and its contents will depend on what can be parsed from the image content.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.IndexableText
member.summary: Indexable text attributes for the file (can only be written)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Kind
member.summary: The type of file. This is always drive#file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Labels
member.summary: A group of labels for the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LastModifyingUserName
member.summary: Name of the last user to modify this file. This will only be populated if a user has edited this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LastViewedByMeDate
member.summary: Last time this file was viewed by the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Md5Checksum
member.summary: An MD5 checksum for the content of this file. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.MimeType
member.summary: The MIME type of the file. This is only mutable on update when uploading new content. This field can be left blank, and the mimetype will be determined from the uploaded content's MIME type.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ModifiedByMeDate
member.summary: Last time this file was modified by the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp). Note that setting modifiedDate will also update the modifiedByMe date for the user which set the date.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Last time this file was modified by anyone (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp). This is only mutable on update when the setModifiedDate parameter is set.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.OriginalFilename
member.summary: The original filename if the file was uploaded manually, or the original title if the file was inserted through the API. Note that renames of the title will not change the original filename. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.OwnerNames
member.summary: Name(s) of the owner(s) of this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Parents
member.summary: Collection of parent folders which contain this file. Setting this field will put the file in all of the provided folders. On insert, if no folders are provided, the file will be placed in the default root folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.QuotaBytesUsed
member.summary: The number of quota bytes used by this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.SharedWithMeDate
member.summary: Time at which this file was shared with the user (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ThumbnailLink
member.summary: A link to the file's thumbnail.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.Title
member.summary: The title of this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.UserPermission
member.summary: A single permission for a file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.WebContentLink
member.summary: A link for downloading the content of the file in a browser using cookie based authentication. In cases where the content is shared publicly, the content can be downloaded without any credentials.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.WritersCanShare
member.summary: Whether writers can share the document with other users.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ExportLinksData
member.summary: Links for exporting Google Docs to specific formats.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData
member.summary: Metadata about image media. This will only be present for image types, and its contents will depend on what can be parsed from the image content.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.Height
member.summary: The height of the image in pixels.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.Location
member.summary: Geographic location information stored in the image.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.Rotation
member.summary: The rotation in clockwise degrees from the image's original orientation.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.Width
member.summary: The width of the image in pixels.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.LocationData
member.summary: Geographic location information stored in the image.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.LocationData.Altitude
member.summary: The altitude stored in the image.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.LocationData.Latitude
member.summary: The latitude stored in the image.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.ImageMediaMetadataData.LocationData.Longitude
member.summary: The longitude stored in the image.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.IndexableTextData
member.summary: Indexable text attributes for the file (can only be written)

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.IndexableTextData.Text
member.summary: The text to be indexed for this file

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LabelsData
member.summary: A group of labels for the file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LabelsData.Hidden
member.summary: Whether this file is hidden from the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LabelsData.Restricted
member.summary: Whether viewers are prevented from downloading this file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LabelsData.Starred
member.summary: Whether this file is starred by the user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LabelsData.Trashed
member.summary: Whether this file has been trashed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.File.LabelsData.Viewed
member.summary: Whether this file has been viewed by this user.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.FileList
member.summary: A list of files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.FileList.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.FileList.Items
member.summary: The actual list of files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.FileList.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#fileList.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.FileList.NextLink
member.summary: A link to the next page of files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.FileList.NextPageToken
member.summary: The page token for the next page of files.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.FileList.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this list.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentList
member.summary: A list of a file's parents.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentList.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentList.Items
member.summary: The actual list of parents.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentList.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#parentList.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentList.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this list.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentReference
member.summary: A reference to a file's parent.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentReference.Id
member.summary: The ID of the parent.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentReference.IsRoot
member.summary: Whether or not the parent is the root folder.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentReference.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#parentReference.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentReference.ParentLink
member.summary: A link to the parent.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.ParentReference.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this reference.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission
member.summary: A single permission for a file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.AdditionalRoles
member.summary: Additional roles for this user. Only commenter is currently allowed.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.AuthKey
member.summary: The authkey parameter required for this permission.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the permission.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.Id
member.summary: The ID of the permission.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#permission.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.Name
member.summary: The name for this permission.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.PhotoLink
member.summary: A link to the profile photo, if available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.Role
member.summary: The primary role for this user. Allowed values are: - owner - reader - writer

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this permission.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.Type
member.summary: The account type. Allowed values are: - user - group - domain - anyone

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.Value
member.summary: The email address or domain name for the entity. This is not populated in responses.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Permission.WithLink
member.summary: Whether the link is required for this permission.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.PermissionList
member.summary: A list of permissions associated with a file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.PermissionList.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.PermissionList.Items
member.summary: The actual list of permissions.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.PermissionList.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#permissionList.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.PermissionList.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this list.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision
member.summary: A single revision of a file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.DownloadUrl
member.summary: Short term download URL for the file. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the revision.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.ExportLinks
member.summary: Links for exporting Google Docs to specific formats.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.FileSize
member.summary: The size of the revision in bytes. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.Id
member.summary: The ID of the revision.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.Kind
member.summary: This is always drive#revision.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.LastModifyingUserName
member.summary: Name of the last user to modify this revision.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.Md5Checksum
member.summary: An MD5 checksum for the content of this revision. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.MimeType
member.summary: The MIME type of the revision.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Last time this revision was modified (formatted RFC 3339 timestamp).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.OriginalFilename
member.summary: The original filename when this revision was created. This will only be populated on files with content stored in Drive.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.Pinned
member.summary: Whether this revision is pinned to prevent automatic purging. This will only be populated and can only be modified on files with content stored in Drive which are not Google Docs. Revisions can also be pinned when they are created through the drive.files.insert/update/copy by using the pinned query parameter.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.PublishAuto
member.summary: Whether subsequent revisions will be automatically republished. This is only populated and can only be modified for Google Docs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.Published
member.summary: Whether this revision is published. This is only populated and can only be modified for Google Docs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.PublishedLink
member.summary: A link to the published revision.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.PublishedOutsideDomain
member.summary: Whether this revision is published outside the domain. This is only populated and can only be modified for Google Docs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.SelfLink
member.summary: A link back to this revision.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.Revision.ExportLinksData
member.summary: Links for exporting Google Docs to specific formats.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.RevisionList
member.summary: A list of revisions of a file.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.RevisionList.ETag
member.summary: The ETag of the list.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Drive.v2.Data.RevisionList.Items
member.summary: The actual list of revisions.
